info.author: Morty
info.name: Elektro Power Save
info.shortdescription: Shuts down your Dreambox into Deep Standby (Power Save Mode)
info.description: The Elektro Power Save Plugin puts the box from Standby to sleep mode (Deep Standby) at specified times.\n This only happens if the box is in standby and no recording is running or scheduled during the next 20 minutes.\n The box automatically wakes up for recordings or at the end of the specified sleep time. Hence you needn't wait for it to boot-up.
